name: Arcane Subtlety
baseDescription: Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 5 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 20%.

name: Arcane Focus
baseDescription: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 4%.

name: Improved Arcane Missiles
baseDescription: Gives you a 80% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.

name: Wand Specialization
baseDescription: Increases your damage with Wands by 13%.

name: Magic Absorption
baseDescription: Increases all resistances by 2 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 1% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.

name: Arcane Concentration
baseDescription: Gives you a 2% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

name: Magic Attunement
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by 25%.

name: Improved Arcane Explosion
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion spell by an additional 4%.

name: Arcane Resilience
baseDescription: Increases your armor by an amount equal to 50% of your Intellect.

name: Improved Mana Shield
baseDescription: Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 10%.

name: Improved Counterspell
baseDescription: Gives your Counterspell a 50% chance to silence the target for 4 sec.

name: Arcane Meditation
baseDescription: Allows 5% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

name: Presence of Mind
baseDescription: When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

name: Arcane Instability
baseDescription: Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 1%.

name: Arcane Power
baseDescription: When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast.  This effect lasts 15 sec.
